Nova stranka Niš: Za vlast interes Er Srbije ispred interesa gradjana

03 Nov 2019, 11:10

Nova stranka saopštila je povodom vesti o ukidanju tri linije avio-prevoza na niškom aerodromu "Konstantin Veliki", da je postalo jasno da režim stavlja interes vlasnika kompanije Er Srbija ispred interesa gradjana i državne ekonomije.Nova stranka ocenila je da sramno zvuče tvrdnje predstavnika vlasti SNS-a koji su, kako je navela, svojevremeno širili laži kako Grad Niš nema dovoljno novca da razvija aerodrom i da je u interesu svih da država preuzme upravljanje njime, kada je i više nego očigledno da je taj potez uništio aerodrom "Konstantin Veliki".Niški odbor Nove stranke podsetio je na "nedopustive uvrede" predsednika države Aleksandra Vučića koji je u više navrata gradjane Niša, koji su se civilizovano borili za svoj aerodrom, nazivao "onima koji samo dižu dreku"."U zarobljenoj državi, koju vode isključivo mutni dogovori i tajni ugovori, bilo je na žalost i očekivano da će finansijski interesi 'Vučićeve arapske braće' i ovoga puta kao i u slučajevima rušenja Savamale i projekta Beograd na vodi, biti stavljeni ispred interesa gradjana koji ostaju zatočenici režima i sada im se uskraćuje čak i mogućnost da putuju", navedeno je u saopštenju.Odbor Nove stranke Niš apelovao je na sve gradjane da i ovoga puta ustanu i pridruže se u borbi za poboljšanje izbornih uslova koji bi na prvim sledećim izborima zadali ozbiljan udarac režimu, kao što su se oduvek hrabro suprotstavljali urušavanju svog grada i svoje države.

New Niš Party: The interest of Air Serbia over the interests of citizens of the Serbian government

03 Nov 2019, 12:10

The new party announced on the news of the abolition of three air services at Nis's Constantine the Great airport that it became clear that the regime was putting the interests of Er Serbia's owners ahead of the interests of citizens and the state economy. SNS, who, she said, once spread lies that the City of Nis does not have enough money to develop the airport and that it is in the interest of all for the state to take over the management of it, when it is more than obvious that the move destroyed the Constantine the Great airport. .The New Party Nis Committee recalled the "intolerable insults" of President Aleksandar Vucic, who repeatedly called the citizens of Niš, who had been civilly fighting for their airport, "those who only raise a shit." turbid agreements and secret agreements, it was unfortunately expected that the financial interests of 'Vucic's Arab Brothers' would be this time as well as in cases of ru of Savamala and the Belgrade Water Project, to be placed in the interests of the citizens who remain prisoners of the regime and are now denied even the opportunity to travel, "a statement from the New Party Niš Committee urged all citizens to stand up and join this time as well. in the fight to improve electoral conditions that would cause a serious blow to the regime in the next elections, as they have always bravely opposed the collapse of their city and their state.
